lemma Ord_add_mult_iff: assumes "\<beta> \<in> elts \<gamma>" "\<beta>' \<in> elts \<gamma>" "Ord \<alpha>" "Ord \<alpha>'" "Ord \<gamma>" shows "\<gamma> * \<alpha> + \<beta> \<in> elts (\<gamma> * \<alpha>' + \<beta>') \<longleftrightarrow> \<alpha> \<in> elts \<alpha>' \<or> \<alpha> = \<alpha>' \<and> \<beta> \<in> elts \<beta>'" (is "?lhs \<longleftrightarrow> ?rhs")
